testcase.name: testWrapAroundEast

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: If the snake leaves the screen, it re-emerges at the other end. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=6, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ --------------- OO>... | O.>... ...A.. | ......
step=1, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ --------------- .OO>.. | ..O>.. ...A.. | ......
step=2, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ --------------- ..OO>. | .AOO>. ...A.. | ......
step=3, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ --------------- ...OO> | .A.OO> ...A.. | ......
step=4, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ --------------- >...OO | >A..OO ...A.. | ......
step=5, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ --------------- O>...O | >>>>>> ...A.. | >>>>>>
step=6, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ --------------- OO>... | O.>.OO ...A.. | ......
step=7, rand=6, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ --------------- .OO>.. | O.O>OO ...A.. | ......

testcase.name: testWrapAroundSouth

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: If the snake leaves the screen, it re-emerges at the other end. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=2, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ OO>. | OO>. .A.. | .... .... | ..A. .... | ....
step=1, rand=2, actions=<ChangeDir(South()), Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .OO. | .OO. .Av. | ..v. .... | ..A. .... | ....
step=2, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..O. | vvvv .AO. | vvvv ..v. | vvvv .... | vvvv
step=3, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .OO. .AO. | ..O. ..O. | .... ..v. | ..v.
step=4, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..v. | .Ov. .A.. | ..O. ..O. | .... ..O. | ..O.
step=5, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..O. | ..O. .Av. | ..v. .... | .... ..O. | ..O.
step=6, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..O. | vvvv .AO. | vvvv ..v. | vvvv .... | vvvv

testcase.name: testWrapAroundWest

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: If the snake leaves the screen, it re-emerges at the other end. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=2, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ OO>. | OO>. .A.. | .... .... | ..A. .... | ....
step=1, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .OO> | .OO> .A.. | .... .... | ..A. .... | ....
step=2, rand=2, actions=<ChangeDir(South()), Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..OO | ..OO .A.v | ...v .... | ..A. .... | ....
step=3, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ...O | ...O .A.O | ...O ...v | ..Av .... | ....
step=4, rand=2, actions=<ChangeDir(West()), Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | <<<< .A.O | <<<< ..<O | <<<< .... | <<<<
step=5, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | ...O .A.. | ...O .<OO | .<.O .... | ....
step=6, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | ...O .A.. | ...O <OO. | <O.O .... | ....
step=7, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .A.. | ...O OO.< | OO.< .... | ....
step=8, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | <<<< .A.. | <<<< O.<O | <<<< .... | <<<<
